name: Don't Go In The Basement!
description:
Don't Go In The Basement is a horror game about curiosity.

Little Timmy hears something in the basement and know he should call the police which he does. While he waits for them to arrive tho, the lure of curiosity pulls him towards the basement. What could be in there? A wild animal? Santa? It could even be a boat! The pull of the basement becomes ever stronger...

WASD to move shift to run, collect items to distract yourself and reduce the pull of the basement. When time is up collect open the door for the police and win.
